vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a new subdistrict for TH-3(A) Townhouse District uses and standards on property zoned Residential Use Subdistrict within Planned Development District No. 625, on the south corner of South Lancaster Road and Crouch Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a conceptual plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a conceptual plan and conditions
Z234-114(MB)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council at the public hearing on November 13, 2024 and is scheduled for consideration on December 11, 2024.
